meanings.sent1: In the story, the tritons helped sailors navigate the seas.
meanings.sent2: The tritons in ancient tales were powerful beings of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The tritons decided to start a band underwater, playing seashells as instruments.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like the call of the tritons, enchanting all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The tritons' tails shimmered in the sunlight, captivating all who beheld them.
